data.client_settings: Crossplatform, tried with Safari 12.0 (unsupported), Firefox 62.0.2 and Google Chrome Canary for Android 71.0.3557.2
data.actual_result: In the first case the page has a black background and the text is hard to read, also the whole page is messed up (the text and images's position are wrong); in the second case the colours are inverted and the positions are not correct, also the 404 GIF covers part of the text; in the last case the error 404 page is properly shown.
data.expected_result: The page is properly shown in all the cases.
data.short_description: 404 error page not properly displayed when added a second slash. [Website bug, crossplatform]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the discordapp website and add a second slash ("/") at the end of the link. - Obverse the page. - Now try adding a text that should work after the double slash, "branding" for example - Observe the page again. - Add a random text after the double slash and observe.
